# Generated by "yarp cmake"

# A cmake file to get started with for new YARP projects.
# It assumes you want to build an executable from source code in 
# the current directory.


cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.7)

set(KEYWORD "classifier")

# Start a project.
project(${KEYWORD})

# Find YARP.  Point the YARP_DIR environment variable at your build.
find_package(YARP REQUIRED)
find_package(OpenCV REQUIRED)

#find_package(ICUBcontrib REQUIRED)
#find_package(emorphLib)

list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${YARP_MODULE_PATH})

# Search for source code.
file(GLOB folder_source src/*.cpp src/*.cc src/*.c)
file(GLOB folder_header include/*.h)
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${folder_source})
source_group("Header Files" FILES ${folder_header})

set(EMORPH_INCLUDE_DIRS /usr/local/src/robot/eventDriven/src/obsolete/emorph_lib/include)
message("${EMORPH_INCLUDE_DIRS}")

include_directories(${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${EMORPH_INCLUDE_DIRS}
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

message("${INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES}")
#include(ICUBcontribHelpers)
#include(ICUBcontribOptions)
#icubcontrib_set_default_prefix()

# Set up our main executable.
if (folder_source)
  add_executable(${KEYWORD} ${folder_source} ${folder_header})
  target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} ${YARP_LIBRARIES})
else (folder_source)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No source code files found. Please add something")
endif (folder_source)

#install(TARGETS ${KEYWORD} DESTINATION bin)
